entities.name: the whumping willow
entities.description: The Whumping Willow is mentioned as the location where Harry and Ron are standing. It is described as being near the hospital wing.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is eyeing Harry and Ron like a wrathful eagle. She is mentioned as being in charge of the Sorting Ceremony.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts who has been injured and is bleeding. He wants to watch his sister being Sorted.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts who is arguing with Professor McGonagall about the points taken from Gryffindor house.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts that Harry and Ron are a part of. It has been accused of breaking the rules by taking the car without permission.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall scolds Ron for being injured and not following the rules.
Harry argues with Professor McGonagall about the points taken from Gryffindor house.
Gryffindor is Harry's house at Hogwarts.
